triples.name: Autonomous agent
triples.relevance: The paper builds on autonomous agents as the foundation for human-agent teamwork systems.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Multi-agent systems are central to modeling groups with multiple autonomous and human agents working together.

triples.name: Adaptive collaborative control
triples.relevance: The paper proposes adjustable autonomy as a form of adaptive collaborative control for human-agent teamwork.

triples.name: Human-robot interaction
triples.relevance: Human-robot interaction principles are fundamental to designing effective human-agent teamwork systems.

triples.name: Robotics simulator
triples.relevance: The paper uses simulation to model and simulate realistic robotic work situations in space environments.

triples.name: Software agent
triples.relevance: Software agents are one of the agent types designed in the paper for human-agent teamwork.

triples.name: Agent-based model
triples.relevance: Agent-based modeling is used to model realistic work situations and human-agent interactions.

triples.name: Workflow management system
triples.relevance: Workflow management concepts are relevant to coordinating human-agent teamwork in space operations.
